tool_description: Analyzes customer messages to identify intent categories and extract key entities for appropriate response routing.

conversation_history.description: Previous messages in conversation for context

error_messages: Empty message: Cannot classify intent of empty message
Classification failed: Unable to determine customer intent
Invalid customer tier: Use one of [basic, premium, enterprise]
usage: Provide message_text and optionally conversation_history and customer_tier for better context. Returns intent classification with confidence scores.
